**I am a PhD student at UC San Diego performing research in the biological sciences.**

**I graduated from UCLA in 2019 with a Bachelor of Science in Microbiology, Immunology, and Molecular Genetics, also majoring in Human Biology and Society and minoring in Public Health.**

**My research has focused thus far on bacteriophage biology, comparative genomics, and CRISPR effector discovery.**
